Pet Policy
/$
$
We love our furry friends, but please note that we only allow
service dogs
on the premises. This policy is strictly enforced to ensure a welcoming environment for everyone. Thank you for your understanding!
/$
$
Reservations
/$
$
We recommend calling ahead for parties 8 or more but reservations are not required.
/$
$
Inquiries
/$
$
Have any questions about our menu or dining experience? Feel free to reach out to us.
​
​
For employment opportunities and private events please contact us via phone or email.
​​
​​​​Phone: (772) 324-8268
E-mail:
salernopearl@gmail.com
